author: remm
msg: - Cleanup of the permission generation in the new WebappLoader.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'J2EE_13_17'.

author: craigmcc
msg: Minor changes in preparation for modifying the way that request dispatching
is implemented.  Currently, Catalina adds a request and/or response wrapper
around the one provided by the application, which will be prohibited in
the PFD3 version of the Servlet 2.3 spec.  The new behavior will be to
insert a wrapper just above the container-provided implementation objects

author: craigmcc
msg: Add unit tests to verify that bean classes can be read from /WEB-INF/classes,
a JAR file in /WEB-INF/lib, and a parent class loader.

author: remm
msg: - Fix classpath generation problem on Unix.
